<title level="1" right="Hazard 3" pfs="">[Web Lurker Deadfall](/Hazards.aspx?ID=30)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 325</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A web tripwire lets loose a bundle of boulders that fall on all targets within a 10-foot square.

---

**Stealth**
DC 23

**Disable**
[Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (trained) or [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) DC 20 to rearrange the webbing

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 19, **Fort** +9, **Ref** +9

</column>

**Deadfall** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature steps into the square with the web tripwire. **Effect** All creatures in the trap’s 10-foot square take 2d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 20 basic Reflex save).
name: Web Lurker Deadfall
